column1: 두 개의 한국: 근대한국의 역사와 사회
column6: Midterm was a take home exam and final is a 7+ page essay. Every student has a presentation too. Professor does not really understand technology so for the student it makes things easier. Listening to the class is not necessary. The professor also gives good grades extremely easily.

column1: 두 개의 한국: 근대한국의 역사와 사회
column6: Professor is very goood and give good grade
